# How to Contribute a Cheat Sheet

## Contribute a New Cheat Sheet

Want to contribute a cheat sheet of your own?

Weâ€™d like to help you make and share high quality cheatsheets on R topics. The template below provides a useful starting place. It contains tips for designing a three or four column cheatsheet, as well as reusable elements to build your sheet with.
